attributes.additional_details: Stop news papers display a picture of German Shepherd every time they want to publish news about dangerous dogs and dangerous breeds as the GSD breed is not listed in the .GOV web site. the following breeds are.Pit Bull Terrier,Japanese Tosa,Dogo Argentino and Fila Brasileiro.
attributes.background: I am a German Shepherd Owner. My GSD is a family pet. Every time I go out with dog, even dog is very friendly, because of the publicity in the news papers, that always picture a German Shepherd every time they want to publish news about dangerous dogs, make public to be very wary of GSDs

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding on the content of media.
